Detailed Description

This class implements relative gap.

where is the shortest path of O-D pair .

privatevirtual

value of the calculated convergence measure.

Implements ConvMeasure.

FPType RelGap::calculateGap ( FPType  minTravelTime)
privatevirtual

Calls calculateGap(). Might be overwritten by derived classes to calculate convergence measure value without calculating minimum travel time which is possible only for relative gap calculation.

Returns
value of the calculated convergence measure.

Reimplemented from ConvMeasure.

FPType RelGap::calculateGapValue ( FPType  minTravelTime,
FPType  totalTravelTime 
)
private

If total travel time is close to zero ( ), this method returns infinity. It is assumed that in this case the problem is not feasible. It occurs only in Frank-Wolf methods (see FWAlgo) on first iteration because link flows are not yet updated after AON assignment but minimum travel time is already calculated.
